meanings.definition: A person who holds a title or position.
meanings.sent1: The titleholder of the school's spelling bee was announced today.
meanings.sent2: She is the titleholder of the prestigious award for best student.
meanings.sent3: The titleholder of the 'Best Dancer' title tripped on stage during the performance.
meanings.sent4: As the titleholder of the 'Fastest Runner' award, he zoomed past his competitors effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The titleholder of the 'Class President' title gave a speech to inspire her classmates.

meanings.definition: The current champion or winner of a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The titleholder of the chess tournament is a master strategist.
meanings.sent2: Who will be the titleholder of the upcoming singing competition?
meanings.sent3: The titleholder of the hot dog eating contest had a stomachache after the event.
meanings.sent4: She fought hard to become the titleholder of the tennis championship.
meanings.sent5: The titleholder of the spelling bee proudly displayed the winner's trophy.
